lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Twins acquired starting pitcher Hector Santiago a minor leaguer from the Los Angeles Angels for right-handers Ricky Nolasco and Alex Meyer and cash, completing the deal Monday just before the non-waiver trade deadline.

headline.print_headline: Twins Send Nolasco, Meyer to Angels in Swap for Santiago
headline.main: Twins Send Nolasco, Meyer to Angels in Swap for Santiago

snippet: The Minnesota Twins acquired starting pitcher Hector Santiago a minor leaguer from the Los Angeles Angels for right-handers Ricky Nolasco and Alex Meyer and cash, completing the deal Monday just before the non-waiver trade deadline....
